name: Connect
abstract: Only on OS 5.9.0 and above, Streaming your desktop and Play SteamVR games.

detail.app_developer: 海南创见未来科技有限公司
detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Italian, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Thai
detail.app_publisher: 海南创见未来科技有限公司
detail.app_release_note:
1. Added the Ultra HD option, which supports gameplay streaming at 3K resolution.
2. Increased the AVC bitrate to a maximum of 1,000 Mbps. (Requires a USB 3.0 wired connection. The maximum bitrate for wireless connection is 300 Mbps.)
3. Added a controller adjustment function for SteamVR, which allows for adjustments to controller position and rotation.
4. Added a text sharpening function for desktop streaming for improved clarity in text browsing.
5. Added the function to quickly turn on virtual keyboard for desktop streaming.
6. Added "Minimize to System Tray" function.
7. Added "Launch at Startup" function.
8. Added a private connection mode. Once enabled, your PC can only be connected to headsets logged into the same account.
9. Optimized the log feedback function on the PC.
10. Fixed known issues.
